name: Subterene
description:
A short (2- 3 hour) survival horror game. Bore deep below the earth's surface in your all-terrain mining vehicle. Drill for ores, scan for artifacts, and explore an expansive subnautical cavern system.

Four levels of deep earth cavern to explore!

Mine your own path!

Harrowing final boss!

Discover what happened to Mining base TRN3NRN.

Download includes the full game and a PDF of concept art!
